pullRequest.title: Bugfix/text exercise/working example submissions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
The example submissions for text exercises were broken. They implementation was a mix of calling the actual submission endpoints (which try to also then fetch the participation for the submission, which is non existent for examples) and the example API endpoints. There were also some bad practices related to REST APIs (HTTP 400 for a not found entity; GET request created new objects e.g. results, etc.)
Fixes

Removed all unnecessary calls to the real submission endpoints
Fixed the resources incl. their endpoints strings to be more REST conform (404 for not found, GET doesn't create an entity, etc.).
Fixed the creation of new example submissions
There also is a new endpoint in the result resource for creating empty example results. This was previously done in the GET request, which fetches the example result. In the end, we still reduce the total number of requests with this PR
Fixed the update of example submissions

Steps for Testing

Log in to Artemis
Navigate to Course Administration
Click on a Course
Create a text exercise and save it.
Edit the same text exercise
Create an example submission
Save the example submission
Update the example submission
Save the example submission
Create an example result
Save the example result
Update the example result
Save the example result

commit.message: Fix creation of new text example submissions including example result

Fix update of example text submissions

Also add missing query in text exercise repo
Add missing example boolean to result model

nodes.bodyText: can we move this method directly into the super class and use the submissionRepository instead?
can we move this into the submission repository?
I guess this should be update instead of upsert, right?
I think you have reslutService twice here.

The comment is a bit misleading. Is it the id of the submission or the id of the example submission?
I guess it is the id of a submission that belongs to an example submission right?
I guess we should also emphasize this in the comment at the top, that the submission must be connected to an example submission, otherwise this call throws an illegal argument exception. Otherwise another developer might be tempted to use this method.
I even think you should rename the method to createNewExampleResultForSubmissionWithExampleSubmission or something similar

commit.message:
fix compile error after PR comments

also move method to super class and resolve TODO
fix some logic errors for authentication and move method up to super class
rename method and fix javadoc comment
